verses.name: Isaiah 17:7
verses.text: At that day shall a man look to his Maker, and his eyes shall have respect to the Holy One of Israel.

verses.name: Isaiah 17:8
verses.text: And he shall not look to the altars, the work of his hands, neither shall respect that which his fingers have made, either the groves, or the images.

verses.name: Isaiah 17:9
verses.text: In that day shall his strong cities be as a forsaken bough, and an uppermost branch, which they left because of the children of Israel: and there shall be desolation.
